resources.string: You are just one click away from appetizing dishes
Your Order Has Been Placed Successfully.
This feature is under development. Here, you will see your previous orders.

This is a food ordering app. This app can be used by canteens of different institutions and offices to order their lunch by doing their work. The main purpose to save time of going to the canteen. 
In this hypothetical canteen, there are two categories available. Clicking on the image will get you to the page of your choice menu. In the cart, you will see your final amount to be paid. 
This application has been made by using Recycler View, Data Binding, Fragments, Navigation, View Model, Room Database concepts.
 In future, a central database can be added to store the ordered value, which will then be received by the chef of the canteen. Another database holding the previous orders of the specific user will also be added.
